pullrequest.title: Implemented orbit around an arbitrary point

content.raw:
1. I've added some more logic to help with this case. If nothing is under the mouse, then the reference visual is project 10m in front of the camera. If the resulting motion is too slow, then you can hold control and the speed should double (roughly).

2. Fixed.

3. Fixed.
content.html:
1. I've added some more logic to help with this case. If nothing is under the mouse, then the reference visual is project 10m in front of the camera. If the resulting motion is too slow, then you can hold control and the speed should double (roughly).

  2. Fixed.

  3. Fixed.
